question: Which among the following sets of fauna represents same taxonomical order?
explanation: Marine mammals are a diverse group of animals. They include <u>cetaceans (whales, dolphins, and porpoises)</u>, <u>sirenians (manatees and dugong)</u>, <u>pinnipeds (true seals, eared seals and walrus),</u> a few otters (the sea otter and marine otter) and the polar bear (usually grouped with the marine mammals).
